metadata.synopsis: Karlach is in the party and meets the leader of the paladins of Tyr while she is nearby

41.speaker: Anders
41.text: Please - no more! Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.

55.speaker: Karlach
55.text: Cut the crap, Anders. I know what you are.

59.speaker: Anders
59.text: Don't let her hurt us - please, we just want to go home.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: You don't fear Karlach; you want to kill her on Zariel's behalf.

26.speaker: Anders
26.text: Ha. I never was good at playing the coward. There is no beast here or in the Hells I fear; not with Her Ladyship's protection. Least of all this dog.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: You'll need to convince me you're not who she says you are.

70.speaker: Anders
70.text: I'll tell you whatever you wish to know. Just let us live - please.

64.speaker: Player
64.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: They serve the archdevil Zariel. Biggest liar in all the realms. Seems her servants have picked up some of mummy's tricks.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: Believe me, these sneaky fucks won't stop 'til they have me hogtied at her feet.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

42.speaker: Anders
42.text: It isn't true. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.
42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

28.speaker: Anders
28.text: We thought you a devil. And with your flames you proved us right.
28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

63.speaker: Anders
63.text: But Tyr will not consign us to our death. He is merciful. Leave us, and we'll leave you.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Enough of this charade. I know who you really are.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

2.speaker: Player
2.text: You say you serve Tyr. Recite the Creed of the Left Hand.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

50.speaker: Anders
50.text: Wh - I - please, I am wounded. Overcome. I can hardly remember my own name.

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: I'll rip your tongue out, you liar.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: There's something wrong here. I can sense it in my bones.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

15.speaker: Player
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

60.text: You can't possibly believe this shit.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: You can't possibly believe this shit.
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

9.speaker: Karlach
9.text: Go on if you want. But I can't.

10.speaker: Anders
10.text: That's right, Karlach. So now as in the Hells. I can see why Her Ladyship wants a murderous brute like you back.
10.context: NodeContext: stronger in tone, with an edge in his voice; the mask is slipping

45.speaker: Player
45.text: 'Her Ladyship' Zariel? I thought you served Tyr?
45.context: NodeContext: Dropping the 'wounded guy' act; turning steely and evil. Latter half is addressed to player

29.speaker: Anders
29.text: Enough - enough. I'll not play pretend anymore. Karlach, you're going home in pieces if needs must. And you - you'll soon learn what it means to ally yourself with the likes of this garbage.
29.context: NodeContext: Dropping the 'wounded guy' act; turning steely and evil. Latter half is addressed to player

56.speaker: Player
56.text: Stand down, Karlach, or I'll have to intervene.
56.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

68.speaker: Karlach
68.text: Pretty please, try. I'm in the mood for destruction.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I won't let you hurt these people.

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: These aren't people. Not really. I don't want to fight you, but I'm not letting them go.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: You've made your choice, Karlach. Now you'll face the consequence. Me.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: Pity. I could've used a friend. But if you choose to lie down with devils, you wake up with my boot in your arse.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: You're certain they're servants of Zariel?

66.speaker: Karlach
66.text: These pricks deserve it more than anyone you've ever met.

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I'm putting my trust in you. Do what you will.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: You can't be certain. And I can't let you hurt them.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'm willing to put my trust in you, if you're certain these people are dangerous.

11.speaker: Player
11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

25.speaker: Anders
25.text: You'd do well to reconsider your alliance with this animal. She destroys all she touches. Useful in the Blood War; frighteningly dangerous anywhere else.
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

72.speaker: Anders
72.text: Rage all you want, Karlach. Burn with the might of the Hells. Zariel will find you; she will bring you home in pieces, and your little friends will have to watch. Unless we feed you their eyeballs first.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

76.speaker: Karlach
76.text: Avernus was never my home. It was my prison. I'm free now. AND I'M NEVER GOING BACK.
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

21.speaker: Anders
21.text: You and your foolish friend can rage all you want, Karlach. Zariel will never let you go; return home now and spare your comrades - and yourself - a gruesome death.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: You can drop the act. I know you're servants of Zariel.

57.speaker: Anders
57.text: Zariel?! Certainly not - we serve Tyr, Lord of Justice, and no other.

5.speaker: Anders
5.text: Please, mercy. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Assess his posture, his eyes - is he telling the truth?

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *There's something in the squint of his eye. You suspect he's lying.*

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *There's something in the squint of his eye. You suspect he's lying.*

36.speaker: Anders
36.text: The Archduchess will be delighted when we return with Karlach's head on a pike.

3.speaker: Anders
3.text: The Archduchess will be delighted when we return with Karlach's head on a pike.

24.text: What sort of devilment is this?! Paladins - to arms! This one is with the fiend.

30.speaker: Anders
30.text: What sort of devilment is this?! Paladins - to arms! This one is with the fiend.

62.speaker: Anders
62.text: You brought her here?! We won't survive another assault. Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.
